title: Cool

author: Agung Pamungkas
comment: Nice watch and why the weather not update after show in watch? When its update after last 3 hours cycle it wont update until I change face and back to this face and weather will update. My watch and phone always connected, and 20 minutes interval update in setting.

author: Soccerloumike
comment: Face will not turn ambient.  just stays on forever and kills my watch battery super fast. I have to manually keep turning the screen off with my hand, if it wasn't for this this the app face would be phenomenal.
title: Nice face for Moto 360 but..........

author: MR FIRE-EATER!
comment: Had a problem with purchase but was resolved quickly.  Great watch face.  Will be my goto for sure!  This is one of my many I have purchased.  Wish ya had a buy 5 get 2 free.  Lol. Keep up good work!

author: Thorfin Hjelson
comment: I have this one and the v02 but neither are working on my second gen moto 360. It just shows the numbers but nothing else I love your product so please get back to me so I can get this fixed

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I've updated the app could you please check it out?
And if you have an additional question,plz feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

title: Worked and now it doesn't

author: Chris James
comment: I have so many of your watch faces. So many thanks. I couldn't get the purple \ violet theme. Prompt and helpful response from programmer.  Thanx! This watch face is fantastic. My new favourite over F01

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.

Here is the instruction for purple design.
1.Open setting screen of V20
2.Swipe down and Tap 'Preset for Interactive'
3.Select '6:G-Violet'
4.And Tap 'Preset for Ambient'
5.Select '6:G-Violet(amb)

For additional question,please feel free to contact our email address.We can give you a help.

Thank you.

title: Wanted same colour scheme as shown
